review: For those who want outdoor adventure accompanied by a competent staff, good food, roughing it a little bit and, and beautiful scenery, this is your home base. We participated in quite a few outdoor activities such as mountain biking (at both expert and beginner level) hiking, rafting in the Ganges, yoga sessions and even shopping and sunset aarthi in Rishikesh. . The tents were spacious if basic, the facilities clean and adequate, the bucket showers hot and the food plentiful.  With evening bonfires under the the beautiful starry sky we ended each day contented and ready for more
name: Debora Z
